title: [b]Textbox Size[/b]
desc:
Governs the height of the textbox. Automatic is considered experimental and may produce inconsistent results until further testing.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Render Textless[/b]
desc:
When enabled, card will be rendered with only a name and type box and no textbox or other text elements.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Use Nickname[/b]
desc:
When enabled, card will be rendered with both a 'real' name and a 'nickname' you can enter manually.
[b](Default: False)[/b]
